description: Detects Certify a tool for Active Directory certificate abuse based on PE metadata characteristics and common command line arguments.
author: pH-T (Nextron Systems)
name: HackTool - Certify Execution
query: ((((process.executable.text:"*\\Certify.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"Certify.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.Description:*Certify*))) OR ((process.command_line.text:("*.exe\ cas\ *" OR "*.exe\ find\ *" OR "*.exe\ pkiobjects\ *" OR "*.exe\ request\ *" OR "*.exe\ download\ *") AND process.command_line.text:("*\ \/vulnerable*" OR "*\ \/template\:*" OR "*\ \/altname\:*" OR "*\ \/domain\:*" OR "*\ \/path\:*" OR "*\ \/ca\:*"))))
